Module downfall
Package downfall.realm.template

Class VisualMaterialTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • downfall.realm.template.MaterialTemplate
      • downfall.realm.template.VisualMaterialTemplate
  • public final class VisualMaterialTemplate
extends MaterialTemplate
    Template that is used when new materials are generated. It stores a pathname that leads to its GFX and an JavaFX Image if a reference to that is required. This Class if fully annotated for use with JAXB to be exported to an XML File.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VisualMaterialTemplate

        public VisualMaterialTemplate()
        Default Constructor. it generates an invalid VisualMaterialTemplate with an id of -1

      • VisualMaterialTemplate

        public VisualMaterialTemplate​(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.Integer id,
                              java.lang.Integer defExportPrice,
                              java.lang.Integer defImportPrice,
                              java.lang.Boolean isExportable,
                              java.lang.Boolean isEphemeral)
        Initializes pathToGFX to the default MaterialGFXPathname defined in the current configuration.
        Parameters:
        name - Human-readable name of the materials to be generated with this template
        id - Unique identifier used to differentiate different material templates
        defExportPrice - Default export price
        defImportPrice - Default import price
        isExportable - Value that determines if the material will be exportable from the realm
        isEphemeral - Value that determines if the material can be stockpiled or stored

      • VisualMaterialTemplate

        public VisualMaterialTemplate​(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.Integer id,
                              java.lang.Integer defExportPrice,
                              java.lang.Integer defImportPrice,
                              java.lang.Boolean isExportable,
                              java.lang.Boolean isEphemeral,
                              java.lang.String pathToGFX)
        Parameters:
        name - Human-readable name of the materials to be generated with this template
        id - Unique identifier used to differentiate different material templates
        defExportPrice - Default export price
        defImportPrice - Default import price
        isExportable - Value that determines if the material will be exportable from the realm
        isEphemeral - Value that determines if the material can be stockpiled or stored
        pathToGFX - String pathname to an image file that represents this material. That Image should be square, but isn't required to be square

    • Method Detail

      • pathToGFXProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty pathToGFXProperty()
        Lightweight accessor method.
        Returns:
        pathname to an image file that represents this material as a property.

      • updateGFX

        public javafx.scene.image.Image updateGFX()
        Updates the Image representation material to comply with the current value of pathToGFXProperty
        Returns:
        new Image that has been updated.

      • getGFX

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getGFX()
        Lightweight accessor method that initiates graphics if they haven't been initialized
        Returns:
        Image that represents this material.

      • getPathToGFX

        public java.lang.String getPathToGFX()
        Lightweight accessor method.
        Returns:
        String pathname to an image file that represents this material.

      • setPathToGFX

        public void setPathToGFX​(java.lang.String pathToGFX)
        Lightweight Mutator Method
        Parameters:
        pathToGFX - String pathname to an image file that represents this material. That Image should be square, but isn't required to be square
